author: Alex Persa
comment: Worst possible route, no subways, terrible estimation of arrival, can't check the stations on map, no zoom out on double tap. Google maps is much better.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Alex,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Amir Eldor
comment: Bad user experience. Support never replies. Ugly user interface. Hate that I have to use it daily to commute.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Amir,

Thank you for rating us. 
Can you please contact us (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong? We promise to reply ;)

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Shashank Bhavaraju
comment: Lovely app. Helped me a lot after I moved to Singapore

author: David Koh
comment: Always improving the apps to make it easy for everyone and never keep you worrying about what bus to take to your destination!

author: A Google User
comment: The best app ever! Makes public transport fun and friendly :)

author: Charles Burke
comment: Perfect!

author: Ina Yordanova
comment: Very helpful

author: Amy Hereford
comment: Awesome

author: Hidayah Howell
comment: Hello Moovit team! I need you guys to know that you guys totally saved me for three times. Not only you guys give me the very accurate direction, you guys also help me to save budget on transport. This app is totally life changing! But one thing that I would like to ask is that how do I earn the points? I've been completing my journey for three times so far and I havent earn any points. Please answer.   Side note: I told my friends about Moovit and they are so satisfied when they used the app for the first time! Keep up the good work!   Best regards,  Dayah 💕

author: Denean Pillay
comment: The app is amazing. The ease of use for different transport modes and the real time data is especially useful. Possible improvements would be the map search function as I struggle to find actual locations without an address readily available. Also the map orientation with my real time movement is slow. Overall, minor changes to make this app even better than it is. Thank you team!

author: wizzo hizzo
comment: Only good for buses. Useless for trains I.g overground underground..national rail..even if it picks up train location the time is totally wrong. Uninstalling it coz I don't do buses. Useless app n waste of memory.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello wizzo,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Laz Conor
comment: I tried several apps like this and so far Moovit worked the best for me. One thing I couldn't do, is to check the timetables for trains on other stations which is not related to my location.

author: Florence Escott
comment: Fabulous!  I have anxiety on the bus, and the get off alerts are so helpful, smart, and such a relief!  You can see, plan, and control every aspect of your trip.  It's so much better than the official Trimet trip planner.  Love love love it!

author: Betty l
comment: it lies when it comes to critical couple of minutes and is sort of accurate on 10-15 min long scales thus making you miss the bussed most available to you while making wait the15 min you would anyway for a buss ye didnt have the urgency to look up on the first place. really very fkn annoying

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Betty,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Matteo Furia
comment: looking for "Via Turati" in Milan, the app fails to suggest "Via Filippo Turati". Citymapper instead suggest it as the first option. Please check your map service provider, or tweak the way you use it.

author: Jennifer Chang
comment: It's confusing and not user-friendly. It was easier to check the arrival time with the earlier version. Please tweak it to make it less complicated, thank you.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Jennifer,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Nigel Roach
comment: Decent app. 90% of time it gets the info correct  Although they should monitor their staff when posting weather warnings. A rude, trying to be clever, weather warning is not really funny.

author: Lorna Fleckenstein
comment: ORIGINALLY I GAVE 5 STARS... THEN THE UPDATES STARTED AND THE APP, AFTER SEVERAL UPDATES, HAS BECOME FRUSTRATING FOR ME BECAUSE IT'S NOT CLEAR WHEN THE ARRIVAL TIME IS FOR THE BUS... IT WAS EASIER TO USE AND UNDERSTAND BEFORE THE LAST FEW UPDATES

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

author: Sherry Lamboy
comment: This is the best app I've ever used for public transportation its so easy to use and provides all the info you need I am totally happy I found it its made my life so much easier to go any where its a 100 in my eyes great job!!!😙😁😁😁😁😊😄

author: Ben Kenobi
comment: What a load of rubbish. Tried to find best transport to get to de monfort uni from west midlands. couldnt even find a route by road or rail.  deleted

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Ben,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Christina Bruehler
comment: There are occasions when the access to determining the arrival time is:  -Disabled  -Bounces all over the place  -States the bus has arrived, though has never showed up  -Stated that it is arriving "Now" then jumps to "8 minutes" away and then randomly appears after the now & before the 8 minutes.  -There needs to be an ability to have more of an interface between commuters within the live feedback.  -There also needs to be a clearer area to provide that live feedback/update concerning the status of the bus.  -As a feedback I had when describing this app as a blend of Google Navigation and Onebus Away with the ability to provide feedback.  -This had an individual reference the driving navigation app called Wayz; that has a better feedback/update format for the users of the app.    -This App needs to also be further developed for Iphones. As there are countless individuals I have told about this app. Though they are unable to get it due to it not being a multifacted app that crosses the platform of Android and Iphone.

author: Raw 2Ride
comment: Seems to work great. Used it for a cuppla years now. Helps if your phone has plenty of ram, as it can drain your battery. My new phone has no problems with it though.

author: Ryan Carter
comment: Accurate and reliable but UI let's you down in a rush. Can't find you favourite stops quick enough,especially on a dense London  street.

author: Dominic Leung
comment: It offers features that the survey asked, but the result is very wrong. The route option is not correct, arrival time is so wrong.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Dominic,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: jose martinez
comment: Thank you Guys for responding Me, right now I got great news everything is working Good.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content: Hello jose, thanks for taking the time to rate us. Please contact us at support@moovitapp.com and elaborate about the issues you experienced with the new version. You can find great tips to get the most out of Moovit here: https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/en-us Safe travels!

author: Ray DeTone
comment: I press notifications to find out what subway lines are under construction or not on normal schedule and I get a that asks me what my favorite view is...not helpful!

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Ray,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: D Cox
comment: Moovit had some problems but it seems to be back in working order,. I'm glad I truly live using this app. It true on time service from NYC to NJ Transit to MetroNorth

author: Lindsay Mirsky
comment: I always love the moovit app, because it helps me a lot to get around where ever I need to go with the subway and buses.

author: Raffy Paulino
comment: Moovit is the best transit App in the Google Play Store. I keep telling my Friends and Family members about Moovit. Last night was the last time I did! Keep improving Team Moovit and thank you for this wonderful App!!!

author: Diego Raga
comment: The app is OK, but sometimes it doesn't have so much alternatives as the website. I mean, In Buenos Aires, Argentina, I choose to go to Pilar, so in the app it just give you the option to go by train but on the website you have more options like going on a bus, and has more routes; so if you can updates the routes on the app, I will give you 5 stars, thank you.

author: Gabriella Andrade
comment: Muito útil, salvou minha vida muitas vezes e nunca me deixou na mão. Precisa de internet pra usar, então fiquem de olho no 3g

author: Geoff Thorpe
comment: Unreliable and far from complete. Eg. I am currently in Lanzarote and trying to plan a journey for tomorrow. The "full" timetable on Moovit tells me there are two buses daily to my intended destination. There are actually five.

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content:
Hello Geoff,

Thank you for rating us.
Can you please contact our support team from within the app (under the main menu) and tell us what exactly is wrong?

 Waiting to hear from you.

author: Alison Wallace
comment: The best public transport app by a mile,way better than the official site,keep up the good work guys :)

reply.author: Moovit
reply.content: Hello Alison, thanks for your message. We’re happy to hear that you're enjoying Moovit. We have a favor to ask: if you have friends that ride public transportation, please share Moovit with them. Also, follow us on Twitter & Facebook where we regularly post the latest news and tips & tricks for using Moovit. Safe travels!

author: Lisa Curry
comment: I love this app. Literally takes you by the hand and tells you which route you need and what time it is due. You can watch live on the map as you travel your route. Even alerts you to the approaching stop you need to be off at.

author: Kenneth Svendlund
comment: Installed it for the second time and saw right away why I uninstalled it the first time. It provides some correct information but show also a lot of information that had nothing to do with my location or seach. My location is in and around Barcelona. So uninstalled it again for the second time...

author: Maher The Engineer
comment: I can't live without this application XD I give it 5 stars  I want tell information not about this app but just to make people know it : I'm from South Arabic and my country under the brutal occupation of Yemen for 30 years or more :'(  Anyone can help please help . . .

author: Valarie Arokiam
comment: Just started using it. Getting around Melbourne by train and tram couldn't be easier. Love the alerts when close to destination.

author: Gustavo Ruano
comment: I like this application it tells me exactly what time the bus in going to be and i dont have to wait a long time out  in the cold for the bus
A good bus ride and hitchhiking app. Let's you construct a fast route and gives live ETA of busses to your location.

author: Keith Te
comment: I have got this app on 2 tablets, 1 Acer, 1 Samsung. I can't find an option to use Landscape mode display. I have even installed it on my Android TV box, the display is ok on that, but I would like Landscape display on my Tablets.
